body_html:
Ok,another try:

<snip>
[Default is: "3.5,5.2"]: 6.0
INFO: $TEST_TMPDIR defined: output root default is '/local/cvsupport'.
....................
INFO: Starting clean (this may take a while). Consider using --expunge_async if the clean takes more than several minutes.
INFO: $TEST_TMPDIR defined: output root default is '/local/cvsupport'.
...............
WARNING: /trinity/home/cvsupport/dmitry/tf/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl:116:3: ========================= test ==========================.
INFO: All external dependencies fetched successfully.
Configuration finished

$ ps -elf | grep bazel
0 S cvsuppo+  51964      1 99  80   0 - 505728 futex_ 14:12 ?       00:01:58 bazel(tf) -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -XX:HeapDumpPath=/local/cvsupport/_bazel_cvsupport/c61d2ac558d6d30ef2694b9af72e4144 -Xverify:none -Djava.util.logging.config.file=/local/cvsupport/_bazel_cvsupport/c61d2ac558d6d30ef2694b9af72e4144/javalog.properties -Djava.library.path=/local/cvsupport/_bazel_cvsupport/install/60eac8be1d9f8622135925f67ceca06d/_embedded_binaries/ -Dfile.encoding=ISO-8859-1 -jar /local/cvsupport/_bazel_cvsupport/install/60eac8be1d9f8622135925f67ceca06d/_embedded_binaries/A-server.jar --max_idle_secs=15 --connect_timeout_secs=10 --install_base=/local/cvsupport/_bazel_cvsupport/install/60eac8be1d9f8622135925f67ceca06d --install_md5=60eac8be1d9f8622135925f67ceca06d --output_base=/local/cvsupport/_bazel_cvsupport/c61d2ac558d6d30ef2694b9af72e4144 --workspace_directory=/trinity/home/cvsupport/dmitry/tf/tensorflow --deep_execroot --experimental_oom_more_eagerly_threshold=100 --nofatal_event_bus_exceptions --client_debug=false --use_custom_exit_code_on_abrupt_exit=true --product_name=Bazel --option_sources=
0 S cvsuppo+  53608  50980  0  80   0 -  1735 pipe_r 14:13 pts/0    00:00:00 grep --color=auto bazel

$ ls  -l $(bazel info output_base)/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool
INFO: $TEST_TMPDIR defined: output root default is '/local/cvsupport'.
.................
total 16
-rwxrwxr-x 1 cvsupport cvsupport 1267 Feb 21 14:12 BUILD
drwxrwxr-x 3 cvsupport cvsupport   17 Feb 21 14:12 clang
-rwxrwxr-x 1 cvsupport cvsupport 8928 Feb 21 14:12 CROSSTOOL

$ ps -elf | grep bazel
0 S cvsuppo+  54379  50980  0  80   0 -  1735 pipe_r 14:16 pts/0    00:00:00 grep --color=auto bazel

so bazel info killed bazel. I would expect that bazel build kills bazel server

0 S cvsuppo+  53608  50980  0  80   0 -  1735 pipe_r 14:13 pts/0    00:00:00 grep --color=auto bazel

$ ls  -l $(bazel info output_base)/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool
INFO: $TEST_TMPDIR defined: output root default is '/local/cvsupport'.
.................
total 16
-rwxrwxr-x 1 cvsupport cvsupport 1267 Feb 21 14:12 BUILD
drwxrwxr-x 3 cvsupport cvsupport   17 Feb 21 14:12 clang
-rwxrwxr-x 1 cvsupport cvsupport 8928 Feb 21 14:12 CROSSTOOL

```
0 S cvsuppo+  54379  50980  0  80   0 -  1735 pipe_r 14:16 pts/0    00:00:00 grep --color=auto bazel
```
so `bazel info` killed bazel. I would expect that `bazel build` kills bazel server
